Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone Bad Transaction
Reviews.Author: Gwendolyn E. Cherry
Reviews.Content: The iPhone arrive with no accessories, no power cord. The nTelos manager in Chesapeake, VA indicated that they could not activate the phone due to an adverse matter related to the phone. The phone was paid for  ($264.00) yet I can not use it. The seller agreed to send another phone. To date I have not received it. I have purchased many items with Amazon, this was my first bad experience.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with my purchased! (iPhone 4)
Reviews.Author: Trae
Reviews.Content: I purchased the iPhone 4. I am extremely pleased with the product. The phone is in great condition, it looks brand new. It came with a charger, headphones, and a quality Outterbox phone case. I got the phone activated at Ntelos with no problem and everything works perfectly. Also, shipping was very fast. I would recommend this seller! Thanks for the wonderful purchase!

Reviews.Title: prob the best erson ever
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: I asked several questions to the person an he was nice and had manners fully answering any question I had. when I placed the order he instantly sent it. and my iphone is brand new and is exactly as what he said it was. there needs to be more honest sellers like this one.
